course_description: Building on basic principles of lactation/breastfeeding management, emphasis is on competence in assessment, diagnosis and treatment of lactation issues beyond the scope of a generalist. Content is leveled toward becoming a lactation consultant (LC) and meeting LC certification requirements.
sections: Class Nbr: 3224, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: M 5-7:50p, Instructor: C. Ura, Status: Open
